mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTH_AUTHREF${tableSuffix} ( ID, REFID, AUTHREFTYPE, AUTHID, SYSTEMID, AUTHTYPE, VALIDDEPENDENDDATE, CREATEOPERID, ENDDATE, CREATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{authItemRef.id,javaType=java.lang.String}, #{authItemRef.refId,javaType=java.lang.String}, #{authItemRef.authRefType,javaType=java.lang.String}, #{authItemRef.authItem.id,javaType=java.lang.String}, #{authItemRef.authItem.systemId,javaType=java.lang.String}, #{authItemRef.authItem.authType,javaType=java.lang.String}, #{authItemRef.validDependEndDate,javaType=boolean}, #{authItemRef.createOperId,javaType=java.lang.String}, #{authItemRef.endDate,javaType=java.util.Date}, #{authItemRef.createDate,javaType=java.util.Date} )
